querystring.select: SELECT RCM.CUST_MODEL_NAME AS CustModelName, RP.PROFESSION_NAME AS ProfessionName
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP_CUST AC WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_PERSONAL ACP WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.APP_CUST_ID = ACP.APP_CUST_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_PERSONAL_JOB_DATA ACPJD WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACP.APP_CUST_PERSONAL_ID = ACPJD.APP_CUST_PERSONAL_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_PROFESSION RP WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACPJD.MR_PROFESSION_CODE = RP.PROFESSION_CODE LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_CUST_MODEL RCM WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.CUST_MODEL_CODE = RCM.CUST_MODEL_CODE
